subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With a complete game from Adam Wainwright and a homer from David Freese, the Cardinals never trailed in a win over the Pirates, who were outdone by a better version of themselves.
snippet: With a complete game from Adam Wainwright and a homer from David Freese, the Cardinals never trailed in a win over the Pirates, who were outdone by a better version of themselves.
